remarks: Contraposition property of a polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2014.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolcon.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lpolcon.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
lpolcon.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lpolcon.o $e |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
lpolcon.x $e |- ( ph -> X C_ V ) $.
lpolcon.y $e |- ( ph -> Y C_ V ) $.
lpolcon.c $e |- ( ph -> X C_ Y ) $.
lpolconN $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` Y ) C_ ( ._|_ ` X ) ) $.
